Test Case Description: Validate admin dashboard loads with admin navigation menu
Expected Result: Admin dashboard displays with admin-specific menu items accessible

Test Case Description: Validate admin dashboard shows system statistics and user metrics
Expected Result: Admin dashboard displays system-wide statistics and user management metrics

Test Case Description: Validate user dashboard loads with user navigation menu
Expected Result: User dashboard displays with user-specific menu items accessible (not admin items)

Test Case Description: Validate dashboard shows user storage usage
Expected Result: Dashboard displays current user storage usage

Test Case Description: Validate file preview modal opens for supported formats
Expected Result: Preview modal opens displaying file content correctly

Test Case Description: Validate file preview handles unsupported formats gracefully
Expected Result: Appropriate message shown for unsupported file types

Test Case Description: Validate user can access profile settings page
Expected Result: Profile settings page loads with user information

Test Case Description: Validate user can update profile information
Expected Result: Profile information updated successfully with confirmation

Biometric setup page accessible from profile

Test Case Description: Validate premium status display after purchase
Expected Result: Premium status reflected in user interface
Document uploaded successfully to user storage
All selected documents uploaded successfully

Test Case Description: Validate file type restrictions during upload
Expected Result: Invalid file types rejected with appropriate error

Test Case Description: Validate file size limits during upload
Expected Result: Large files rejected when exceeding size limits

Test Case Description: Validate document list displays all user files
Expected Result: All user documents displayed in organized list/grid

Test Case Description: Validate document search and filter functionality
Expected Result: Documents filtered correctly based on search criteria
Documents sorted correctly by name/date/size
Document renamed successfully with new name displayed
Document properties/metadata updated successfully

Expected Result: Document moved to trash and removed from main view
Document restored from trash to original location
Document permanently deleted from system
